definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: The photo was bought by a computer programmer from Federal Gera lot.
sentences.chinese: 那張照片被一位來自前聯邦德國的電腦程序員買走了。

sentences.english: Bonn ist die Hauptstadt der Bundesrepublik Deutschland.
sentences.chinese: 聯邦德國的首都是波恩。

sentences.english: Chapter two discusses the FRG and the building of the common nuclear forces of NATO.
sentences.chinese: 第二章，“聯邦德國與北約的核力量建設”。

sentences.english: It was a very serious problem on the rearmament of The Federal Republic of Germany after the Second World War.
sentences.chinese: 重新武裝聯邦德國是二戰後一個極爲敏感的問題。

sentences.english: The Bundeswehr German army had refused to take part in the mission.
sentences.chinese: 聯邦德國國防軍曾拒絕參與任務。
